summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6232 for the improvement of Front Street from Maynard Ave. to 4th Ave. South; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89377, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
